p: Regarding the veterinary vaccines against ZVL, two preventive canine formulations have been registered in Brazil: Leishmune® in 2003 ( 80– 84) and Leishtec® in 2008 ( 85). In Europe, where visceral leishmaniasis is also a canid zoonosis, two other vaccines were licensed: Canileish® in 2011 ( 86) and Letifend® ( 87) in 2016.
